description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名民族资本家，有“面粉大王”和“棉纱大王”之称。
description.en: A famous modern Chinese national capitalist, known as the 'Flour King' and 'Cotton Yarn King'.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名民族资本家，荣德生的胞兄。
description.en: A famous modern Chinese national capitalist, the elder brother of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生和荣宗敬的父亲。
description.en: Father of Rong Desheng and Rong Zongjing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物和企业家，曾任中华人民共和国副主席，是荣德生的儿子。
description.en: Chinese politician and entrepreneur, former Vice President of the People's Republic of China, and son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生的曾孙女。
description.en: Great-granddaughter of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省的一个县，是荣德生的出生和逝世地。
description.en: A county in Jiangsu Province, the birthplace and death place of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 由荣德生、荣宗敬兄弟创办的系列企业，涵盖面粉、纺织等行业，包括茂新、福新、振新、申新等公司。
description.en: A series of enterprises founded by brothers Rong Desheng and Rong Zongjing, covering industries such as flour and textiles, including companies like Maoxin, Fuxin, Zhenxin, and Shenxin.

description.zh-cn: 第二次中日战争期间侵占中国的日本军队。
description.en: The Japanese army that occupied China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次中日战争期间，由汪精卫等人于中国组建的亲日政府。
description.en: A pro-Japanese government established in China by Wang Jingwei and others during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫政权的外交部长。
description.en: Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生之子。
description.en: Son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、军事家，在荣德生被绑架时下令限期破案。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who ordered a deadline for solving the case when Rong Desheng was kidnapped.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府在上海地区的军事警备机构，侦破了荣德生绑架案。
description.en: The military garrison command of the Nationalist Government in the Shanghai area, which solved the kidnapping case of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 时任淞沪警备司令部第二处处长，侦破了荣德生绑架案。
description.en: Then director of the Second Division of the Songhu Garrison Command, who solved the Rong Desheng kidnapping case.

description.zh-cn: 时任淞沪警备司令部警卫队长，参与了绑架荣德生的案件。
description.en: Then captain of the guard at the Songhu Garrison Command, who was involved in the kidnapping of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 1949年在中国大陆成立的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state established in mainland China in 1949.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的政治协商机构。
description.en: The political advisory body of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的大行政区军事和政治领导机构。
description.en: The military and political leadership body of the East China administrative region in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的省级行政管理机构。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative body established in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指在中国近代史上，由中国人投资、经营的，使用机器进行生产的资本主义企业主阶层。
description.en: Refers to the class of capitalist entrepreneurs in modern Chinese history who invested in and operated enterprises using machinery.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生之子。
description.en: Son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生之子。
description.en: Son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生之子。
description.en: Son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生之子。
description.en: Son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生之子。
description.en: Son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁之子，香港上市公司中信泰富有限公司的前主席。
description.en: Son of Rong Yiren, former chairman of the Hong Kong listed company CITIC Pacific.

description.zh-cn: 一家在香港交易所上市的综合企业公司，荣智健曾任该公司主席。
description.en: A conglomerate company listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, where Larry Yung served as chairman.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生是荣熙泰的儿子。
description.en: Rong Desheng is the son of Rong Xitai.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生是荣宗敬的胞弟。
description.en: Rong Desheng is the younger brother of Rong Zongjing.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁是荣德生的儿子。
description.en: Rong Yiren is the son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生是荣文蔚的曾祖父。
description.en: Rong Desheng is the great-grandfather of Rong Wenwei.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生与兄长荣宗敬共同创办了茂新、福新、申新等一系列企业，统称为荣氏企业。
description.en: Rong Desheng and his elder brother Rong Zongjing jointly founded a series of enterprises including Maoxin, Fuxin, and Shenxin, collectively known as the Rong family enterprises.

description.zh-cn: 荣宗敬与胞弟荣德生共同创办了茂新、福新、申新等一系列企业，统称为荣氏企业。
description.en: Rong Zongjing and his younger brother Rong Desheng jointly founded a series of enterprises including Maoxin, Fuxin, and Shenxin, collectively known as the Rong family enterprises.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生出生于江苏省无锡县。
description.en: Rong Desheng was born in Wuxi County, Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 1937年日军占领上海后，荣氏企业的部分工厂被日军炸毁或占据，生产经营活动受到严重阻碍。
description.en: After the Japanese army occupied Shanghai in 1937, some of the Rong family's factories were bombed or seized, severely hindering their production and operations.

description.zh-cn: 1941年，荣德生严词拒绝了汪精卫政权提出的、要求其将名下纱厂卖给日本厂商的要求。
description.en: In 1941, Rong Desheng sternly rejected the demand from the Wang Jingwei regime to sell his yarn mills to Japanese manufacturers.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫政权外交部长褚民谊邀请荣德生面谈出售纱厂事宜，荣德生派其子荣尔仁代为会面并拒绝。
description.en: Chu Minyi, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Wang Jingwei regime, invited Rong Desheng to discuss the sale of his mills, but Rong sent his son Rong Erren to meet in his stead and refuse the offer.

description.zh-cn: 1946年4月25日，时任淞沪警备司令部警卫队长的黄锦堂参与绑架了荣德生，直至5月28日荣德生被释放。
description.en: On April 25, 1946, Huang Jintang, then captain of the guard at the Songhu Garrison Command, participated in the kidnapping of Rong Desheng, who was released on May 28.

description.zh-cn: 荣德生被绑架后，蒋介石严令限期破案，推动了荣德生的最终获释。
description.en: After Rong Desheng was kidnapped, Chiang Kai-shek ordered a deadline for solving the case, which pushed for Rong's eventual release.

description.zh-cn: 时任淞沪警备司令部第二处处长毛森通过侦查最终破获绑架案，促成了荣德生的获救。
description.en: Mao Sen, then director of the Second Division of the Songhu Garrison Command, solved the kidnapping case through investigation, contributing to the rescue of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，选择留在中国大陆的荣氏企业得以继续发展。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, the Rong family enterprises, which chose to remain in mainland China, were able to continue their development.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，荣德生历任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会委员。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Rong Desheng served as a member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，荣德生历任华东军政委员会副主任。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Rong Desheng served as Vice Chairman of the East China Military and Political Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，荣德生历任苏南行政公署副主任。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Rong Desheng served as Vice Director of the Sunan Administrative Office.

description.zh-cn: 荣伟仁是荣德生的儿子。
description.en: Rong Weiren is the son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣尔仁是荣德生的儿子。
description.en: Rong Erren is the son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣伊仁是荣德生的儿子。
description.en: Rong Yiren is the son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣研仁是荣德生的儿子。
description.en: Rong Yanren is the son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣纪仁是荣德生的儿子。
description.en: Rong Jiren is the son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣鸿仁是荣德生的儿子。
description.en: Rong Hongren is the son of Rong Desheng.

description.zh-cn: 荣智健是荣毅仁的儿子。
description.en: Rong Zhijian is the son of Rong Yiren.

description.zh-cn: 荣智健曾任中信泰富有限公司的主席。
description.en: Rong Zhijian served as the chairman of CITIC Pacific Limited.
